module.sqlWrap: SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM RedEnvelopeIncome WHERE (CircleId=@CircleId) ORDER BY RedIncomeId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) Sum(GoldValue) as GoldValue,PassportId FROM RedEnvelopeIncome WHERE (CircleId=@CircleId) group by PassportId ORDER BY GoldValue DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM RedEnvelopeIncome WHERE (CircleId=@CircleId) AND (datediff(day,CreatedTime,getdate())=0) ORDER BY RedIncomeId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM RedEnvelopeIncome WHERE (PassportId=@PassportId) ORDER BY RedIncomeId DESC
